title: 374. Andy & DJ CTI: Jail Time In Switzerland If You Heat Your Home Above 66 Degrees, Artificial Sweeteners Blamed For Heart Disease Risk & Pride Festival Loses Sponsor Over ‘Drag Kids’ Performance
itunes:title: 374. Andy & DJ CTI: Jail Time In Switzerland If You Heat Your Home Above 66 Degrees, Artificial Sweeteners Blamed For Heart Disease Risk & Pride Festival Loses Sponsor Over ‘Drag Kids’ Performance
description: In today’s episode, Andy & DJ discuss the citizens of Switzerland may face prison time if they turn their thermostat above 66 degrees this winter, new studies blaming higher consumption of artificial sweeteners for an increased risk of cardiovascular diseases, and a Utah-based bank withdrawing their sponsorship from the upcoming Boise Pride Festival due to a scheduled “Drag Kids” show.
